content.html: I like that you made this public. Even the bits that you "failed" at. This had me shaking my head for a good 5 mins though: "if this was how you worked on a team, it'd be perfect, and we love it. But in an interview, that's not what we want"
content.value:
I like that you made this public. Even the bits that you "failed" at.

This had me shaking my head for a good 5 mins though:

"if this was how you worked on a team, it'd be perfect, and we love it. But in an interview, that's not what we want"
